author: Special Correspondent
title: IIT-Guwahati develops anti-virus face shield
description: The Indian Institute of Technology-Guwahati (IIT-G) has developed a prototype of a face shield or mask that adheres to the guidelines given by the World Health Organization (WHO), a spokesperson of th
content:
The Indian Institute of Technology-Guwahati (IIT-G) has developed a prototype of a face shield or mask that adheres to the guidelines given by the World Health Organization (WHO), a spokesperson of the institute said.
A team led by Supradip Das of IIT-Gs Dep… [+795 chars]
